title: The General's Sweety
overview: Chef Li Lan accidentally enters the world of the comic The General's Sweety and forms a bond with the cold General Wang Jin. In order to repay the debt left by Li Lan's father, the two open a restaurant together. Li Lan's modern marketing methods and exquisite culinary skills lead to the expansion of their business. They not only clear the debt but also become the wealthiest individuals in Qingshui County.
